subSubSection.paragraph:
This could be
Bathypalaemonella delsolari
( Wicksten and Mendez 1983 ), the only species of this genus reported in the eastern Pacific. However, further identification would require a specimen as characteristic features of the chelipeds cannot be seen in the photograph. Fig. 27
